meaningMnemonic: A <radical>wolverine</radical>'s <radical>heart</radical> is in <radical>prison</radical>, so you need to <kanji>hurry</kanji> to set it free. But don't be too <kanji>sudden</kanji>, or its heart won't survive. And the wolverine's death will be on you.
readingMnemonic: You're trying to <kanji>hurry</kanji> as fast as you can to save the wolverine. But you're losing strength, so you grab a <reading>cu</reading>cumber (きゅう) from your bag and munch on it to get some of your hurrying power back.
